snippet: Nearly half of Americans believe Sony Pictures made the wrong decision by canceling the theatrical release of the comedy "The Interview," the film that provoked a cyberattack on the studio, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Monday....

headline.print_headline: More Americans Disapprove of Sony Film Cancellation: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.main: More Americans Disapprove of Sony Film Cancellation: Reuters/Ipsos Poll

lead_paragraph: Nearly half of Americans believe Sony Pictures made the wrong decision by canceling the theatrical release of the comedy "The Interview," the film that provoked a cyberattack on the studio, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Monday.
